casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony Jerome JACKSON. No. 123P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of February 2005 by Defendant for "Direct Appeal and/or Writ of Habeas Corpus, Certiorari or Supersedeas to the Supreme Court of North Carolina to the Denial of his "Writ of Certiorari by the North Carolina Court of Appeals":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
